Package games.negative.alumina.menu

Interface InteractiveMenuHolder<T extends InteractiveMenu>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the Interactive Menu associated with the holder.
All Superinterfaces:
org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChestMenuHolder, PaginatedMenuHolder
public interface InteractiveMenuHolder<T extends InteractiveMenu> extends org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
This interface represents an Interactive Menu Holder. It extends the InventoryHolder interface. Classes implementing this interface should provide implementations for handling certain events related to the interactive menu. It also provides a method to get the Interactive Menu associated with the holder.
